abstract: Citing the Chesapeake Bay ecosystem as its inspiration, the winning team in the Solar Decathlon called its dwelling WaterShed, proffering solutions to both water and energy shortages.
snippet: Citing the Chesapeake Bay ecosystem as its inspiration, the winning team in the Solar Decathlon called its dwelling WaterShed, proffering solutions to both water and energy shortages.

headline.main: Maryland Team Wins Solar House Contest
